attributes.action: Conduct full investingation into grooming gangs in UK.
attributes.additional_details: Recent call against investingation into grooming gangs is just vile and disgusting, we, as people living here and politicians should both strive for a safe enviroment for our most vulnerable, children, which are abused in this country on a unprecedented rate. There should be proper investigation into the situation on all levels of society, social service, politicians, officers, we, as parent shouldn't keep our kids in homes due to fear of grooming gangs, rapes, and abuse.
attributes.background: Allow independent third parties and government autorities to fully prosecute and properly look into and resolve issues of gangs, starting with grooming gangs all around country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
